get.description:
Get all crops with suitability information for a specific plot.
Returns crops sorted by rotation score and soil compatibility.

schema.title: Response Get Suitable Crops For Plot Plots  Plot Uuid  Suitable Crops Get

get.description:
Get all vegetable bed plots with suitability information for a specific crop.
Returns plots sorted by rotation score and soil compatibility.

schema.title: Response Get Suitable Plots For Crop Crops  Crop Uuid  Suitable Plots Get

get.description:
Get crops filtered by rotation rules for a specific plot.

Returns crops that are:
- Part of the rotation rule system for the plot group's rotation type
- Not in the same rotation groups as crops previously planted in this plot

If nothing has been planted in the rotation cycle, returns all crops in the rule system.

schema.title: Response Get Rotation Filtered Crops Plots  Plot Uuid  Rotation Filtered Crops Get
